title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same feature parity as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode, mobile-friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, pull, delete, copy, and list models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (macOS, Linux, Windows).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local models for QA, summarization, and RAG.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with GPU support, Open-WebUI, and persistent volumes.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Turn-key RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker container.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JS/TS bindings for the Ollama local LLM server.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package; install via pip and interact with Ollama models in Python scripts or notebooks.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles for code, Chinese, Japanese, and fine-tuned LoRA adapters.

title: r/ollama – Local LLMs Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing Ollama tips, new integrations, benchmarks, and model requests.
